tasks.name: Create Project Management Enhancement Templates
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive templates for converting technical reports into project management deliverables. Templates must include executive summary formats, timeline structures, resource allocation matrices, risk assessment frameworks, milestone tracking systems, and stakeholder communication plans that can be applied to any AutoBot technical report.
tasks.notes: Templates must be reusable across different project types and report categories. Follow AutoBot naming conventions and directory structure requirements. Ensure compatibility with existing MCP tool integration patterns.

relatedFiles.description: Existing task tracking format to model milestone progression
Project manager agent configuration with MCP tool patterns
Target directory for PM templates and enhanced reports

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Create PM template directory structure in reports/project/templates/
2. Develop executive-summary.template.md with standardized format
3. Create timeline-and-milestones.template.md with phase tracking
4. Build resource-allocation.template.md with team assignments
5. Design risk-assessment-matrix.template.md with probability/impact analysis
6. Create stakeholder-communication.template.md with reporting schedules
7. Develop success-criteria.template.md with KPIs and acceptance criteria
8. Build budget-estimation.template.md with effort and cost analysis
9. Validate templates follow AutoBot cleanliness standards (reports/project/ location)
10. Document template usage guide for consistent application
tasks.verificationCriteria: All 8 template files created in reports/project/templates/ with consistent formatting, comprehensive coverage of PM elements, clear usage instructions, and validation against AutoBot cleanliness standards.
tasks.analysisResult: Transform AutoBot's technical reports into enterprise-ready project management deliverables by adding formal PM elements (timelines, resource allocation, milestone tracking, risk management, stakeholder communication) while preserving technical content. Create systematic enhancement templates and apply them to key reports in the distributed 6-VM architecture context.
tasks.summary: Successfully created comprehensive project management enhancement template system with 8 specialized templates, usage guide, and README documentation. All templates follow AutoBot cleanliness standards, are properly organized in reports/project/templates/, and provide complete coverage of project management elements including executive summaries, timelines, resource allocation, risk assessment, stakeholder communication, success criteria, and budget estimation. Templates are customized for AutoBot's distributed 6-VM architecture, 19-agent framework, and technology stack. System includes detailed usage instructions, quality assurance checklists, best practices, and examples specific to AutoBot project types.
